textureGroupAssignments.description: A map of resource tree paths to texture groups name. Supported Stitch utilities will use this to assign sprites in those paths (recursively) to the specified texture group.

audioGroupAssignments.description: A map of resource tree paths to audio groups name. Supported Stitch utilities will use this to assign sounds in those paths (recursively) to the specified audio group.

runtimeVersion.description: When set, supported Stitch utilities will preferentially use this GameMaker runtime version.

allowedNames.description: A list of regex patterns that new assets must match. Enforced by supported Stitch utilities.

newSpriteRules.description: Rules for creating new sprite resources, followed by supported Stitch utilities.

mono.description: Whether to default new sounds to mono. When not set, the default is stereo.

defaults.description: Default properties for new sound assets, by name pattern. E.g. `{".*":{ mono: true}}` defaults all new sounds to mono. The first matching pattern is used.

newSoundRules.description: Rules for creating new sound resources, followed by supported Stitch utilities.

description: Stitch configuration schema. Stitch utilities may support subsets of this configuration.
